content: That's a great list, thanks! I actually have a portable power bank that's been really useful during long days out. I remember using it for the first time on the 15th when I was at the park with friends for a picnic. Anyway, what are some tips on how to stay organized and keep my wallet tidy? I've been storing my driver's license, credit cards, and some cash in it, but I feel like it could be even more efficient.
